snippet.title: Borderlands 4 World Premiere Trailer | GAMESCOM Opening Night Live 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the Borderlands 4 world premiere trailer from GAMESCOM Opening Night Live 2024 official livestream with host Geoff Keighley.
